SELECT ds."id" AS "id", ds."name" AS "subName", ds."uuid" AS "uuid", d."name" AS "deptName", ds."location" AS "location", t1."count" AS "doctors", t2."count" AS "masterDoctors", t3."count" AS "generalDoctors" FROM HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT_SUB ds LEFT JOIN HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT d ON ds."dept_id" = d."id" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ds."id", COUNT(sd."id") AS "count" FROM HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT_SUB ds LEFT JOIN HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT_SUB_AND_DOCTOR sd ON sd."dept_sub_id" = ds."id" LEFT JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR d ON sd."doctor_id" = d."id" AND d."status" = 1 GROUP BY ds."id" ) t1 ON t1."id" = ds."id" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ds."id", COUNT(d."id") AS "count" FROM HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT_SUB ds LEFT JOIN HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT_SUB_AND_DOCTOR sd ON sd."dept_sub_id" = ds."id" LEFT JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR d ON d."id" = sd."doctor_id" AND d."job" IN ('director','vice-director') AND d."status" = 1 GROUP BY ds."id" ) t2 ON t2."id" = ds."id" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ds."id", COUNT(d."id") AS "count" FROM HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT_SUB ds LEFT JOIN HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT_SUB_AND_DOCTOR sd ON sd."dept_sub_id" = ds."id" LEFT JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR d ON d."id" = sd."doctor_id" AND d."job" IN ('specialist','vice-specialist') AND d."status" = 1 GROUP BY ds."id" ) t3 ON t3."id" = ds."id"
WHERE ds."id"=${id} LIMIT 1
